name: Trinity Force
description:
The dragon is waiting for you! Recruit heroes, form a three-person team, and challenge the fearsome dragon!
In the game, you need to recruit heroes of different professions to fight, and at the same time you need to upgrade their skills and equipment to make them stronger. There are 7 different occupations in the game, including warriors, thieves, mages, priests, archers, spearmen and shamans. Each occupation will have several skills through upgrading, and the cooperation of different occupations is required in the battle to win the victory.

More content will be continuously updated. If you have any good suggestions, please leave a message or send me an email: worreour@163.com, I will reply one by one.
